name: Don't lie to me.
description:
As a police investigator, you must solve the mysterious dispearance of a woman by listening to the story of three different witnesses.

Play as the three witnesses through their weird stories to find the clues that will lead you to the truth.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The game isn't quite as polished as we would've liked, but we're pretty happy with the result. Tell us if you managed to guess which story is real. We hope you like it. ^^

----- Controls ------

D - Attack

S + (left or right) - Dodge (you can cancel out of your attack with a dodge)

Space - Jump

Arrow keys - Move

Navigate the menus with the mouse.
